Task

Write a report using a mixture of code and text.
The code must run otherwise the report can not be 'knit' into a html (or pdf) document.

1. Line Chart: Monthly cost of antidepressant prescribing per region, for all months
2. Table: Annual cost of antidepressant prescribing per region (requires a pivot)
3. Line Chart: Monthly percentage of all prescribing costs that are for antidepressants per region, for all months.
4. Boxplot: distribution of monthly percentage values
5. Select a Region of your choice.
